short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comic sans sucks. This extension replaces it with the Roboto Google font.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a small css file which replaces comic sans with roboto. Very lightweight and no JS involved.

Inspired by Comic Sans Replacer: https://github.com/niutech/comic-sans-replacer
